overview: A group of new students register to be members of movie association in the university. Pai, Nuna, Tam, and Man travel to the province for fresh new day. When they arrive at a resort in the forest, they find that each student has disappeared one by one. No one knows what has happened to them. Is there a murderer on the loose? They're very scared and try to escape. Who will be the last survivor?
title: Scream
